table.name: Calimport Encounters
table.caption: Calimport Encounters
rows: Sultana Songal, in disguise as a simple scholar, asks the party for news from afar.
An {@creature Adult Gold Dragon|XMM} disguised as a charismatic aristocrat seeks its stolen hoard.
Four {@creature Priest Acolyte|XMM|Priest Acolytes}, led by a {@creature Priest|XMM}, carry the statue of a deity through the street.
A crew of {@b {@dice 2d6}} {@creature Pirate|XMM|Pirates} gets kicked out of a tavern and staggers drunkenly into the party.
A merchant offers exactly the magic item one of the party has been looking for.
Construction workers cry for help when the scaffolding around a nearby temple breaks, leaving them hanging above the ground.
An {@creature Archmage|XMM} accompanied by {@b {@dice 1d4}} {@creature Earth Elemental|XMM|Earth Elementals} rudely insists the party get out of the road and let them pass.
A {@creature Chasme|XMM} flies overhead, chased by Zeraphi on {@item Carpet of Flying|XDMG|Carpets of Flying}.
An {@creature Assassin|XMM} on a rooftop stalks a {@creature Noble|XMM}.
A portal to Sigil opens in the street, and an {@creature Empyrean|XMM} emerges.
A {@item Mechanical Wonder|FRAiF} (domestic) chases an escaped pet.
A {@creature Noble|XMM} recruits the adventurers for an urgent matter that requires great discretion.
A {@creature Commoner|XMM} hosts a con game in the street, challenging tourists to identify where they've hidden a (fake) jewel.
{@dice 2d4} Kochar ({@creature Scout|XMM|Scouts}) compete in an archery contest.
An angry genie emerges from a nearby shop. Everyone gives them a wide berth.
A {@item Mechanical Wonder|FRAiF} (flying) has lost its way and falls in the party's path.
A {@creature Mage|XMM} using a {@item Mechanical Wonder|FRAiF} (mobility) barters with a merchant for rare spell components.
A gnome engineer asks the party to field-test an experimental tunneling vehicle.
Deryan Kaya instructs six aspiring inventors on the latest {@item Mechanical Wonder|FRAiF|Mechanical Wonders}.
Sultana Songal, with guards and attendants, floats through the city in a magic litter.
